# AUDIO::PLAY_PED_RINGTONE

## Summary
Play the currently selected ringtone for the given ped

## Parameters
* **STRING** soundName: The identifier of the ringtone to play
* **ENTITY_INDEX** pedIndex: The ped to trigger the ringtone from
* **BOOL** triggerAsHudSound: Whether to trigger as a HUD/2D sound or as part of the game world

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
All found occurrences in b617d, sorted alphabetically and identical lines removed: https://pastebin.com/RFb4GTny

AUDIO::PLAY_PED_RINGTONE("Remote_Ring", PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 1);
AUDIO::PLAY_PED_RINGTONE("Dial_and_Remote_Ring", PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 1);
